channel.title: Over 9000
channel.description:
[URL=http://lordbost.com/images/?pt=1613015954941][IMG]http://lordbost.com/images/?dt=1613015954941[/img][/URL]
THIS MEME IS EVERYWHERE.
Got me thinking about DBZ again though. I was wondering who everyones favorite nemisis was from the series.
I really liked the entire Cell saga. After that was probably the Frieza saga followed closely by the Majin Buu saga. I also liked alot of the pre-super saiyan episodes.
ps: I couldn't find a good image host and then I remembered that lord bost had an image uploading site. It worked great and I think I'll use it from now on.

item.title: Over 9000
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

asshole_rule:

I liked the Frieza saga. Does anyone know who the hell this “Brolly” is? I think it’s spelled that way >.<

Broly (ブロリー Burorī?), is the featured supervillain in the eighth, tenth, and eleventh movies of the series. He is born with a power level of ten thousand , a power greater than most elite Saiyan warriors, and he is mentally unsettled as an adult, partially due to the crying of the infant Goku in the incubator next to him when they were born, partially due to threatening events pertaining to his birth date, and partially because his power was so extreme. He eventually becomes the “Legendary Super Saiyan” and his destructive tendencies are quelled by a special control device created by scientists for his father, Paragus. After Paragus lures Vegeta, Goku, and their companions to another planet, Broly recalls Goku and goes into a rage, destroying the control device and becoming the unstoppable Legendary Super Saiyan. He effortlessly pummels Super Saiyan Goku, Vegeta, Gohan, and Future Trunks as well as Piccolo before killing his father. He is eventually defeated, but he manages to make his way into an escape pod. He later lands on Earth and goes into a frozen state until the crying of Goten awakens him. He is killed by Goku, Gohan and Goten, though blood samples make their way into the hands of an industrialist, who creates a clone called Bio-Broly. The clone eventually wakes up and becomes mixed with bio-liquid, transforming him into Bio-Broly. He is eventually killed by Goten, Trunks, and Krillin\Android 18. He is voiced by Bin Shimada in the Japanese films, and Vic Mignogna in the English dub. In both Dragon Ball Raging Blast games, Broly attains Super Saiyan Level 3 form.

Read full topic

item.title: Over 9000
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:5, topic:388870”][quote author=Epic Steve link=topic=484690.msg3551783#msg3551783 date=1301596747]
The Cell saga was the best, IMO, then probably the Freeza Saga, then the pre-super saiyan saga.
The Majin Buu saga lasted way too long. It just kept going, and going, and going, and going, and going… (Pun intended. )

Have you seen DB GT? What did you think of it, if you have seen it?

I also like the DB Kai episodes, they’re the same as DBZ but higher quality and it’s more action; For example, in the GBZ series it took Goku about 6? episodes to run snake way, in DB Kai it took like 2 or 3.
[/quote]

I never really got that into DB GT because… Well, I’m not sure why… I also watch the DB Kai from time to time. Isn’t it just the same as the old episodes but digitally remastered or something?

Also, the sagas did end up getting a bit predictable lol. And the Buu saga seemed like it was like 3 or 4 seasons -.-[/quote]
Yea, it’s basically the same, just shorter and digitaly remastered.

krackkid:

<Pure_> VEGITO>*

Gogeta > *

krackkid:

<Pure_> SJ2+3 is the best

True that.
